TEXT.BODY: Shr 1.23 dlrs vs 1.33 dlrs Semi-annual div six cts vs six cts prior payment Net 16.2 mln vs 14.8 mln Sales 1.09 billion vs 909.4 mln NOTE: Dividend is payable April one to holders of record March nine Reuter
